newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative says wins restraint on Cyrix.
newsitem.headline: Creative says wins restraint on Cyrix.

text.p: Creative Technology Ltd said on Tuesday it and its U.S. subsidiary Creative Labs Inc have won a temporary restraining order in a suit against Cyrix Corp over alleged unfair competition.

Multimedia company Creative said in a statement the temporary restraining order against Cyrix and one of its customers, Tiger Direct Inc, gives Creative immediate relief on certain copyright and trademark claims.

The lawsuit, filed on March 17, 1997 in the United States district Court for the Northern district of California, alleged that Cyrix and certain of its customers were misleading consumers as to the capabilities and the source of the computer audio solution provided by the Cyrix Media GX chipset.
